description: Submission of the MCS Certificates and the EPCs  in pursuant to condition 26 (part e and f only) of planning permission ref: 222698VAR dated 27/01/2023 for 'Minor material amendment (S.73) to vary condition no2 (approved plans) and condition no26 (CO2 emissions),condition no28 (energy and sustainability measures), seeking to amend and update the Energy Strategy in pursuant to planning permission reference 214950FUL dated 06/04/2022 and follow up NMA application 224275NMA on 21.12.2022 for 'Construction of a 5 storey building to accommodate 24 self-contained residential units and provision of associated parking space, cycle storage and refuse storage'.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
